title: Read if you dare!
body:
Hello community!!

I was wondering how come there is no such thing as pentasist if there is pentakil, or even quadrasist... i reckon this will make the game more enjoyable for players who main support character like thresh..... it will give support players more recognition since plays are sometimes made by the supports... risking their life for the team to clear... this can also reduce negative behaviour since people with no choice but support when they miss out on lane calling will have something to look forward to.... obviously there may be haters out there but its just an idea...

replies.body: I think it would be a bit overloaded or packed on-screen if the text is used, especially if everyone on your team commits to the pentakill. Maybe on the right-hand side when someone gets a normal kill, instead they get a special border or symbol. I don't know haha, but not a bad idea :)

I agree. But, after a quick 5 seconds of thinking. (and writing out that sentence.) I was thinking that a smaller avatar next to the killer could be a great thing. So for example Riot could add a small avatars of the assistants next to the big avatar of the penta or quadra killer.
